text: LactApp is
the first app dedicated to motherhood and
breastfeeding which strives to answer any
questions women may have related to breastfeeding in
a very personalized way.
When my daughter was five weeks old. We were
both in a terrible accident here in Barcelona.
I couldn't walk. I couldn't hold her. I couldn't
take care of her or my son and even
see my daughter for 10 days after the accident.
And I was breastfeeding at the time.
Hi, Maria, Barreto, co-founder of LactApp.
I had a lot of difficulties breastfeeding my first child.
And it was difficult for me. It was hard to get the resources
I needed.
But I did find Alba. She was leading a
super group in my area. She was amazing. She was
spending hours helping women all around.
I wanted to breastfeed.
And Alba knew, and she wanted to help me. So my
husband and Alba brought my daughter to the hospital

for breastfeeding. Alba was everything I
needed. And I thought if everyone had this
personalized information this community like
I did. If everyone had an Alba
in their pockets, I'm should they could decide anything
they want about their breastfeeding journey.
When a parent downloads LactApp, they set

Just like I did.
It doesn't matter if it's to start breastfeeding or
